alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 20 at 1:59AM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Nassau, Coastal Duval, Western Putnam and South Central Duval Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Western Putnam
